      • org.noise_planet.noisemodelling.jdbc.NoiseEmissionMaker

extends Scene

                                     double[] frequencies,
                                     double phi,
                                     double theta)
        Description copied from class: Scene

        Overrides:
        getSourceAttenuation in class Scene
        Parameters:
        srcIndex - Source index in the list sourceGeometries
        frequencies - Frequency in Hertz
        phi - (0 2π) 0 is front
        theta - (-π/2 π/2) 0 is horizontal π is top
        Returns:

                                  throws SQLException,
                                         IOException
        Retrieves the emissions for the specified period from the given result set
        Parameters:
        rs - result set of source
        period - D or E or N
        slope - Gradient percentage of road from -12 % to 12 %
        Returns:
        Emission spectrum in dB
        Throws:
        SQLException
        IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
